title: Business Analyst
description:
Title - Business Analyst

Location- Pune

Experience level - 4-5 years

Availability - Immediate

Key Responsibilities


Requirements Gathering: Engage with stakeholders to gather and document business requirements, ensuring a clear understanding of their needs and expectations.
Analysis and Evaluation: Analyze existing business processes and systems to identify inefficiencies, gaps, and opportunities for improvement.
Solution Development: Develop detailed business requirements, use cases, and process flow diagrams to support solution development.
Stakeholder Communication: Act as a liaison between stakeholders and project teams, facilitating effective communication and ensuring alignment on project objectives.
Data Analysis: Utilize data analysis techniques to provide insights and support decision-making processes.
Documentation: Create and maintain comprehensive documentation, including business requirements documents, process maps, and user guides.


Testing and Validation: Support the testing phase by developing test plans, executing test cases, and ensuring that solutions meet business requirements.


Project Support: Assist in project management tasks, such as tracking progress, managing risks, and ensuring timely delivery of project milestones.Qualifications:
Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. Relevant certifications (e.g., CBAP, PMI-PBA) are a plus.
Experience: 4+ years of experience as a Business Analyst or in a similar role.


Skills


Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Proficiency in business analysis tools and methodologies.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Proficiency in data analysis and reporting tools (e.g., Excel, SQL).
Familiarity with project management tools and techniques.


Skills:- Business Analysis, Requirement Analysis, Business requirements, Stakeholder communications and Documentation
